problem_text_cn: 如图,若AB是⊙O的直径,CD是⊙O的弦,∠C=30°,BD=1,则⊙O的半径是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, if AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is the chord of ⊙O, ∠C = N_0, BD = N_1, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠A与∠C是同弧所对的圆周角,∠C=30°,∴∠A=30°,∵AB是⊙O的直径,∴△ABD是直角三角形,∴AB=2BD=2×1=2,∴OB=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×2=1．故选:A．
